original_text: If a thief be found breaking up, and be smitten that he die, there shall no blood be shed for him.
korean_text: 도둑이 뚫고 들어오는 것을 보고 그를 쳐죽이면 피 흘린 죄가 없으나

sentences.original_text: If a thief be found breaking up
and be smitten that he die
there shall no blood be shed for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 위해 피를 흘릴 필요가 없다
